00043 template< typename T >
00044 class memory1d {
00045         public:
00050                 typedef std::size_t size_type;

00059                 // before creating memory on it.

00280 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {
00281         malloc();

00285 template <typename T>
00286 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, int init_value, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {
00287         malloc();
00288         set(init_value);
00289 }

00293 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, T const* data, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {
00294         malloc();
00295         copy_to_device(data);

00303         copy_to_device(first, last);

00309         copy_to_device(other);

00325 template <typename T>
00326 void memory1d<T>::set(int value) {
00327         if (cudaMemset( reinterpret_cast<void*>( device_pointer_ ), value, sizeof(T)*size() ) != cudaSuccess) {
00328                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00329         }
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 template <typename T>
00334 void memory1d<T>::malloc() {
00335         if (cudaMalloc( reinterpret_cast<void**>( &device_pointer_ ), sizeof(T)*size() ) != cudaSuccess) {
00336                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00337         }
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00341 template <typename T>
00342 void memory1d<T>::free() {
00343         if (cudaFree(device_pointer_) != cudaSuccess) {
00344                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00345         }
00346 }
00347 
00348 
00349 template <typename T>
00350 template <typename InputIterator>
00351 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( InputIterator first, InputIterator last, int offset ) {
00352         std::vector<T> temp;
00353         temp.assign(first, last);
00354         copy_to_device(temp.size(), &temp[0], offset);
00355 }
00356 
00357 
00358 template <typename T>
00359 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( T const* data, size_type offset ) {
00360         copy_to_device(size(), data, offset);
00361 }
00362 
00363 
00364 template <typename T>
00365 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( size_type count, T const* data, size_type offset) {
00366         if (count + offset > size()) {
00367                 throw exception::memory_access_violation();
00368         }
00369         
00370         if ( cudaMemcpy(device_pointer_+offset, data, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00371                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00372         }
00373 }
00374 
00375 template <typename T>
00376 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device (memory1d const& other, size_type offset) {
00377         copy_to_device(other, other.size(), offset);
00378 }
00379 
00380 
00381 template <typename T>
00382 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device (memory1d const& other, size_type count, size_type offset) {
00383         if (count+offset > size()) {
00384                 throw exception::memory_access_violation();
00385         }
00386 
00387         if ( cudaMemcpy(device_pointer_+offset, other.device_pointer_, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00388                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00389         }
00390 }
00391 
00392 
00393 template <typename T>
00394 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_host (T* destination) {
00395         if (cudaMemcpy(destination, device_pointer_, size() * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost) != cudaSuccess) {
00396                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00397         }
00398 }
00399 
00400 
00401 template <typename T>
00402 template <typename OutputIterator>
00403 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_host(OutputIterator out_iter) {
00404         std::vector<T> temp( size() );
00405 
00406         copy_to_host(&temp[0]);
00407 
00408         std::copy(temp.begin(), temp.end(), out_iter);
00409 }

00414 #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00415 template <typename T>
00416 T& memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) {
00417         return device_pointer_[index];
00418 }
00419 
00420 template <typename T>
00421 T const& memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) const {
00422         return device_pointer_[index];
00423 }
00424 #endif
00425 
00426 template <typename T>
00427 void memory1d<T>::swap( memory1d& other ) {
00428         std::swap(this.device_pointer_, other.device_pointer_);
00429         std::swap(this.size_, other.size_);
00430 }

00432 
00433 template <typename T>
00434 typename memory1d<T>::size_type memory1d<T>::size() const {
00435         return size_;
00436 }
